snippet: A United States service member methodically killed at least 16 civilians, 9 of them children, in southern Afghanistan early Sunday.
abstract: A United States service member methodically killed at least 16 civilians, 9 of them children, in southern Afghanistan early Sunday.
lead_paragraph: A United States service member methodically killed at least 16 civilians, 9 of them children, in southern Afghanistan early Sunday, igniting fears of a new wave of anti-American hostility, officials said. From the Times report by Taimoor Shah and Graham Bowley:

headline.main: Army Sergeant Accused of Slaying 16 in Afghan Villages

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
